name: v1_facts
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool facts_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Get endless interesting facts. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/facts.
API description: Fetches random facts from the API Ninjas Facts API.

limit.description: How many results to return. Must be between **1** and **30**. Default is **1**.
